title: Watch The Bathurst 1000 Live Stream Free Here!
text:
Image: Getty

The 161 lap Bathurst 1000 Supercars Championship kicks off today at 11:15am. If you don't have access to free-to-air TV you can still watch the event for free via the live stream. Here's the link!

The Bathurst 1000's marquee event occurs on Sunday, October 13 at 11:30am Australian Eastern Daylight Time (AEDT). The race will conclude at approximately 6:30pm on the same day.

If you want to stream the race, your best bet is to sign up to a Foxtel's Kayo Sports package. This normally costs up to $35 a month, but new customers can sign up for a free two-week trial. To get access to the Bathurst 1000, simply purchase the $25 base pack from Kayo's website. (Just remember to cancel before the two week trial is up, or Foxtel will start billing your account.)

Here's that link again:

If you're planning to watch on TV, overseas, or just want the full race schedule, you'll find all this and more in our in-depth Bathurst 1000 viewing guide. May the best racer win!

Here's when the Bathurst 1000 Supercars Championship is on in each capital city:

Sydney, NSW: 11:30am Melbourne, VIC: 11:30am Brisbane, QLD: 10:30am Adelaide, SA: 11am Perth, WA: 8:30am Canberra, ACT: 11:30am Darwin, NT: 10am Hobart, TAS: 11:30am
